Name: Healing Boost Module
Description: Healing Boost Module General Category Modules Description Enables prospectors near you to heal from afflictions faster. Buff does not apply to wearer. Flavor Text Spread the love. Attributes Nearby Allies have quicker healing from Bacterial Infections, Parasitic Infections, Poisons and Physical Trauma. Crafting Research Cost 150 50 Crafting Cost 100 50 Prerequisite Mass Dampener Module
